item.description:
Come out and dance the blues Thursday in the beautiful Dance Union studio in Union Square!

Every month they provide a themed Blues series and a beginner crash course with a different set of teachers. On the last Thursday of the month, we hold a Blues Clinic instead of the lesson. The Blues Clinic is like an opportunity to get a mini private lesson with Blues Union instructors. The instructors will make sure to work individually with everyone at the practice for a portion of the evening.

You can work on anything you want (vocabulary, connection, stuff you learned in the previous month’s classes, etc). Though no partner is required, they suggest you bring someone with whom to practice & try new things, since you will not be working with a teacher the entire time.

The floor is beautiful, the vibe is chill, and we always have baked goods!

The Info:

Blues Union – Every Thursday

at Dance Union, 16 Bow Street, Somerville, MA

Series lesson 7:30-8:30pm
Beginner crash course 8:30-9:00pm
OR Blues Clinic 7:30-9:00pm

Dance 9:00-11:00pm

Lesson + dance – $10
Dance only – $5

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Blues Union
